if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase(“yell”)) {
String message = “”;
for (int i = 1; i < cmd.length; i++)
message += cmd[i] + ((i == cmd.length - 1) ? “” : " ");
sendYell(player, Utils.fixChatMessage(message), false);
